channel.title: Tresure trail help

item.title: Tresure trail help
item.dc:creator: @whosdr whosdr
item.description:
@whosdr wrote:

i have been trying to make a tresure trail case and im having trubble…
if i use it anywhere it uses the first case instread of just inside the coords…its hard to explain so look look at code

[code]case 2677://TT
if (!isInArea(2935, 3152, 2941, 3156)) {
addItem (2678, 1);
sendMessage (“welldone!”);
} else {
customCommand (“TT”);
addItem (2677, 1);
sendMessage (“wrong place.”);
sendMessage (“maby he will buy some bananas”);
}
break;

case 2678://TT
if (!isInArea(2691, 3465, 2702, 3459)) {
addItem (2679, 1);
sendMessage (“welldone!”);
}else {
addItem (2678, 1);
sendMessage (“wrong place.”);
sendMessage ("‘prey’ to get this one right!");
}
break;

case 2679://TT
if (!isInArea(3081, 3952, 3070, 3944)) {
addItem (2680, 1);
sendMessage (“welldone!”);
} else {
addItem (2679, 1);
sendMessage (“wrong place.”);
sendMessage (“your ‘wild’ not to get this one!”);
}
break;

case 2680://TT
if (!isInArea(2613, 3094, 2609, 3097)) {
addItem (995, 1);
addItem (995, 1);
addItem (995, 1);
addItem (995, 1);
sendMessage (“welldone!”);
} else {
addItem (2680, 1);
sendMessage (“wrong place.”);
sendMessage (“cba ::jail”);
}
break;[/code]

thats all there is. if i use inside the coords it gives next clue,but if i use outside it also gives the clue. if i take away ! it doesnt work at all.(btw this is dodian)

Read full topic
